title: IIM Vishakhapatnam Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Assistant Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Management Visakhapatnam (IIM Visakhapatnam) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, and B.E./B. Tech can apply for the IIM Vishakhapatnam Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, ag...
